leader_title4: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
leader_name4: The Rt Hon. David Cameron, MP
leader_title5: Secretary of State for Northern Ireland ,  (a United Kingdom minister)
leader_name5: The Rt Hon. Theresa Villiers, MP
ethnic_groups: 99.15% White (91.0% Northern Ireland born, 8.15% other white) ,  0.41% Asian ,  0.10% Irish Traveller ,  0.34% others.
footnote1: Officially recognised languages: Northern Ireland has no official language. The use of English has been established through precedent. Irish and Ulster Scots are officially recognised minority languages
footnote2: .uk is assigned to the United Kingdom of which Northern Ireland is a part, .ie is assigned to Ireland of which Northern Ireland is a part, and .eu is assigned to the European Union of which Northern Ireland is a part. ISO 3166-1 is GB, but .gb is unused
footnote3: +44 is always followed by 28 when calling landlines. The code is 028 within the UK and 048 from the Republic of Ireland
